name: Lion Pose
headline: Clinical skincare tested on diverse skin, now available in Sephora.

founders.name: Nisha Phatak, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder of Lion Pose, making clinical skincare products for people of color. Formerly ran Operations at Great Jones (DTC cookware) and Huggable (DTC infant formula). Former Head of Business Development at Indiegogo and led the Google partnership at Box. Alum of Harvard Business School, Carnegie Mellon (Statistics), Y Combinator, and Sephora's accelerator program. Recovering financial analyst in the consumer tech sector.

founders.name: Madhu Punjabi, Founder
founders.description: Former CEO of Huggable. Previously a Product Manager at Facebook, Pinterest, and TellApart. Prior to that, she worked on finance and partnerships for Google Shopping. Graduated from Harvard Business School and New York University.

## Setting the tone for clinicals.
Most companies do not conduct formal clinical testing. And if they do, they are not required to test on all skin tones and types.
We spend over $50,000 on clinical trials per product to ensure our products are safe and effective for more people.
[ Shop clinically-tested ](http://www.lionpose.com/</products/unspotted-4x-hyperpigmentation-serum>)
![](http://lionpose.com/cdn/shop/files/LionPose1152.jpg?v=1687186916&width=1500)
## Democratizing dermatology.
There are approximately 10,000 dermatologists in the US. That‚Äôs 33,000 people to each dermatologist. 
It‚Äôs just not possible for everyone to get treated when they need it. That‚Äôs why we provide access to clinically effective products that are made to treat the kinds of concerns you might seek a derm‚Äôs advice for.

## Our Story
We saw that clinical brands were not addressing the specific needs and sensitivities of all skin types. Frustrated by the lack of regulation and low clinical standards, we sought to create a brand dedicated to making products that are tested in third party facilities, have statistically significant results, and incorporate more diversity in the testing panel. This is how Lion Pose was born - a brand that is _proven to work_ on all skin tones, types, and textures.

Most companies do not conduct formal clinical testing. And if they do, they are not required to test on all skin tones and types.
We spend over $50,000 on clinical trials per product to ensure our products are safe and effective for more people.

It‚Äôs just not possible for everyone to get treated when they need it. That‚Äôs why we provide access to clinically effective products that are made to treat the kinds of concerns you might seek a derm‚Äôs advice for.

## Our Story
We saw that clinical brands were not addressing the specific needs and sensitivities of all skin types. Frustrated by the lack of regulation and low clinical standards, we sought to create a brand dedicated to making products that are tested in third party facilities, have statistically significant results, and incorporate more diversity in the testing panel. This is how Lion Pose was born - a brand that is _proven to work_ on all skin tones, types, and textures.
